wikipedia_page.main: Percy Clifford Mills (10 January 1909 – 1967) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Notts County where he made over 400 appearances. He was the grandfather of Nigel Pearson.

response: Pearson and his wife, Nicky, have a daughter, Hannah, and a son, former professional footballer James. Pearson's grandfather Percy Mills also played football for Notts County. Pearson's mother passed away on 3 January 2020 at the age of 84, but he took charge of Watford's FA Cup game against Tranmere Rovers the following day.

link_mentions.page: List of English association football families
response: * Percy Mills, Nigel Pearson (grandson), James Pearson (son of Nigel)
